MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Rhos Street, Ffordd Rhufon and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:21AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20PM on 24th February 2021
